text: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṃ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrenti
edit: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṃ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrenti ?

translations.transtext: 152. Monks, how were the seven factors of enlightenment cultivated? How do [they], being practiced frequently, fulfill insight and liberation?
